item.title: 意大利称美国已在审查后大幅削减意大利面关税提案
item.description: 意大利外交部周四表示，美国在对几家意大利面制造商在美国的活动进行重新评估后，大幅降低了对其征收的关税。【原文：Italy's foreign ministry said on Thursday the United States had sharply lowered proposed duties on several Italian pasta makers following a reassessment of their U.S. activities.】

item.title: 媒体报道：日本商界游说团体负责人敦促政府解决日元疲软问题
item.description: 日本两大商业游说团体的负责人在分别接受国内媒体采访时呼吁政府解决日元疲软问题，因为日元疲软抬高了进口成本，给家庭和企业造成了压力。【原文：Two major Japanese business lobbying groups called on the government to address the yen's weakness, which is inflating import costs and weighing on households and businesses, their chiefs told domestic media in separate interviews.】

item.title: 马斯克：Neuralink 计划在 2026 年前 "大批量 "生产大脑植入物
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的大脑植入公司Neuralink将开始 "大批量生产 "脑机接口设备，并在2026年实现完全自动化的外科手术。【原文：Elon Musk's brain implant company Neuralink will start "high-volume production" of brain-computer interface devices and move to an entirely automated surgical procedure in 2026, Musk said in a post on the social media platform X on Wednesday.】

item.title: 2025 年美国将吸引大部分国有投资，资产达到创纪录的 60 万亿美元
item.description: 周四的一份年度报告显示，2025 年，主权财富和公共养老基金投资者向美国投入了高达 1320 亿美元的资金，约占其去年投资额的一半，而大型新兴市场吸引的资金比 2024 年减少了近三分之一。【原文：Sovereign wealth and public pension fund investors poured a whopping $132 billion - roughly half of their investments last year - into the United States in 2025, while big emerging markets drew in almost a third less than in 2024, an annual report showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国农业部详述 120 亿美元农业援助计划，向大米和棉花倾斜；豆农警告称将面临压力
item.description: 美国农业部周三公布了一项 120 亿美元的援助计划明年将为农作物种植者带来多少收入的详细情况，但大豆种植者表示，这些款项不足以帮助那些因农作物价格低迷和贸易争端而受到伤害的农民。【原文：The U.S. Department of Agriculture released details on Wednesday about how much row crop farmers will receive next year from a $12 billion aid program, but soybean growers say such payments fall short of helping those hurt by low crop prices and trade disputes.】

item.title: 五角大楼称洛克希德-马丁公司获得 3.285 亿美元台湾军售合同
item.description: 五角大楼周三表示，洛克希德-马丁公司获得了一份涉及对台军售的合同，以满足台湾空军所谓的 "紧急作战需求"。【原文：The Pentagon said on Wednesday that Lockheed Martin was given a contract involving foreign military sales to Taiwan to meet what Washington calls "an urgent operational need" of the Taiwan Air Force.】

item.title: 五角大楼称波音公司获得 27 亿美元阿帕奇直升机支持合同
item.description: 五角大楼周五表示，美国军方已授予波音公司一份价值 27 亿美元的合同，为阿帕奇直升机提供后期制作支持服务。【原文：The U.S. military has awarded Boeing a $2.7 billion contract for post-production support services related to Apache helicopters, the Pentagon said on Friday.】

item.title: 伯克希尔在巴菲特担任首席执行官的最后一天下跌，60 年来涨幅达 6,100,000
item.description: 在沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）担任首席执行官的最后一天，伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）股价小幅收跌，这位传奇投资家将于周四把缰绳交给格雷格-阿贝尔（Greg Abel）。【原文：Berkshire Hathaway shares closed slightly lower on Warren Buffett's final day as chief executive, with the legendary investor set to hand the reins to Greg Abel on Thursday.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，萨克斯全球公司在拖欠债务后准备破产
item.description: 华尔街日报》周三援引知情人士的话称，萨克斯全球公司（Saks Global）准备在未来几周内申请破产，因为它错过了与收购尼曼-马库斯（Neiman Marcus）相关的债务付款。【原文：Saks Global is preparing to file for bankruptcy in the coming weeks after missing a debt payment tied to its Neiman Marcus acquisition, the Wall Street Journal said on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 桥水的旗舰产品 Pure Alpha 在 2025 年大涨 33%，表现优于最大的对冲基金同行
item.description: 桥水联合基金公司（Bridgewater Associates）的主要宏观基金在 2025 年取得了破纪录的业绩，其旗舰基金纯阿尔法基金（Pure Alpha fund）在美国主要指数强劲增长的推动下，业绩飙升 33%。【原文：Bridgewater Associates' main macro funds delivered a record-breaking performance in 2025, with its flagship Pure Alpha fund generating a 33% jump, buoyed by a robust year for the major indexes in the U.S.】

item.title: 华盛顿批准台积电每年向中国运送美国芯片制造工具
item.description: 台湾半导体制造公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing）周四表示，美国政府已向该公司颁发年度许可证，允许其向位于中国南京的工厂进口美国芯片制造设备。【原文：The U.S. government has granted an annual license to Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing to import U.S. chip manufacturing equipment to its facilities in Nanjing, China, the chipmaker said on Thursday.】

item.title: 宏观趋势拖累加密货币，比特币将出现 2022 年以来的首次年度亏损
item.description: 由于宏观经济压力和增长势头减弱，全球最大的加密货币比特币有望出现自2022年以来的首次年度亏损。【原文：Bitcoin is on track to post its first annual loss since 2022, as macroeconomic pressures and fading momentum weighed on the world's largest cryptocurrency.】

item.title: 美联储买盘和创纪录的回购机制使用使年末美国融资市场保持稳定
item.description: 市场人士表示，本周美国短期融资市场出现了一些年末常见的紧张局面，但美联储再次购买短期国债并大量使用常备回购机制，有助于保持现金流动，防止出现更大的流动性紧缩。【原文：U.S. short-term funding markets saw some of the usual year-end tension this week, but the Federal Reserve’s renewed buying of short-term government debt and heavy use of its Standing Repo Facility helped keep cash flowing and prevented a bigger liquidity squeeze, market participants said.】

item.title: 消息人士称委内瑞拉出口量降至最低，残余燃料填满储油罐
item.description: 四名消息人士称，委内瑞拉陆上油罐中残余燃料库存的积累正迫使国家能源公司 PDVSA 采取极端的解决方案，以避免关闭炼油装置，因为美国的封锁阻止了受制裁的油轮进出该国，从而将出口量降至最低。【原文：The accumulation of residual fuel inventories in Venezuela's onshore tanks is forcing state energy company PDVSA to resort to extreme solutions to avoid shutting down refining units, as a U.S. blockade stopping tankers that are under sanctions from entering and leaving the country cuts exports to a minimum, four sources said.】

item.title: 据《世界报》报道，马克龙希望从 2026 年 9 月起禁止 15 岁以下青少年使用社交媒体
item.description: 据当地媒体周三报道，法国计划从2026年9月起禁止15岁以下儿童访问社交媒体网站，并禁止在高中使用手机。【原文：France plans to ban children under 15 from social media sites and to prohibit mobile phones in high schools from September 2026, local media reported on Wednesday, moves that underscore rising public angst over the impact of online harms on minors.】

item.title: 中国人工智能芯片公司比仁科技在香港上市融资 7.17 亿美元
item.description: 根据周三提交的一份交易所文件，中国人工智能芯片初创公司上海比仁科技在香港首次公开募股中募集到55.8亿港元（约合7.1685亿美元）资金。【原文：Chinese AI chip startup Shanghai Biren Technology has raised HK$5.58 billion ($716.85 million) in its Hong Kong initial public offering, according to an exchange filing on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，Brookfield 将在人工智能热潮中启动云计算业务
item.description: 据 The Information 周三报道，布鲁克菲尔德公司正在启动自己的云计算业务，将数据中心内的芯片直接租赁给人工智能开发者，以期获得对人工智能价值链的端到端控制。【原文：Brookfield is starting its own cloud business to lease chips inside data centers directly to artificial intelligence developers, The Information reported on Wednesday, in a bid to gain end-to-end control of the AI value chain.】

item.title: 特朗普媒体将向股东分发新的数字代币
item.description: 特朗普媒体和技术集团周三表示，将与 Crypto.com 合作向其股东分发一种新的数字代币。【原文：Trump Media and Technology Group said on Wednesday it will distribute a new digital token to its shareholders in partnership with Crypto.com.】

item.title: 银行从纽约联储常备回购机制获得创纪录的流动性
item.description: 由于银行和其他机构在 2025 年最后一个交易日管理流动性需求，符合条件的金融公司周三从纽约联邦储备银行的常备回购机制借入了创纪录数量的现金。【原文：Eligible financial firms borrowed a record amount of cash from the Federal Reserve Bank of New York’s Standing Repo Facility Wednesday, as banks and others managed liquidity needs on the final trading day of 2025.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数降至一个月低点
item.description: 上周，新申请失业救济金的美国人数量意外下降至一个月以来的最低水平，但在招聘低迷的情况下，12月份的失业率可能仍然居高不下。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for jobless benefits fell unexpectedly last week to the lowest in a month, but the unemployment rate likely remained high in December amid sluggish hiring.】

item.title: 推进可重复使用火箭技术，中国陆地空间公司瞄准 10 亿美元上市目标
item.description: 根据上海证券交易所发布的一份文件，中国火箭初创公司陆地空间（LandSpace）计划通过首次公开募股募集75亿元人民币（10.7亿美元）资金，以促进其可重复使用火箭的生产和技术发展。【原文：China's rocket startup LandSpace plans to raise 7.5 billion yuan ($1.07 billion) in a potential initial public offering to boost its production and technology for reusable rockets, according to a document released by the Shanghai Stock Exchange.】

item.title: 美国股指期货交易清淡，但华尔街期待全年涨幅
item.description: 美国股指期货在 2025 年的最后一个交易日走低，但将以强劲的涨势结束这过山车般的一年，其特点是唐纳德-特朗普总统关税的不确定性和围绕人工智能的无与伦比的兴奋。【原文：U.S. stock index futures moved lower on the last trading day of 2025, but were set to wrap up a roller-coaster year characterized by uncertainty over President Donald Trump's tariffs and unrivalled euphoria around AI with robust gains.】

item.title: 独家报道：制药商不顾特朗普压力上调美国 350 种药品价格
item.description: 根据医疗保健研究公司 3 Axis Advisors 独家提供的数据，制药商计划提高美国至少 350 种品牌药物的价格，包括 COVID、RSV 和带状疱疹疫苗以及癌症治疗大片 Ibrance，即使特朗普政府向他们施压要求降价。【原文：Drugmakers plan to raise U.S. prices on at least 350 branded medications including vaccines against COVID, RSV and shingles and blockbuster cancer treatment Ibrance, even as the Trump administration pressures them for cuts, according to data provided exclusively by healthcare research firm 3 Axis Advisors.】

item.title: 中国限制牛肉进口以保护国内产业
item.description: 中国将对从巴西、澳大利亚和美国等主要供应国进口的超过配额水平的牛肉加征 55% 的关税，此举是为了保护正在缓慢摆脱供过于求的国内养牛业。【原文：China will impose an added 55% tariff on beef imports that exceed quota levels from key supplier countries including Brazil, Australia and the U.S. in a move to protect a domestic cattle industry slowly emerging from oversupply.】

item.title: 保时捷因后视摄像头图像问题召回超过 17.3 万辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周三表示，由于车辆倒车时后视摄像头图像可能无法显示，保时捷将在美国召回173538辆汽车。【原文：Porsche is recalling 173,538 vehicles in the U.S. as the rearview camera image may not display when the vehicle is placed in reverse, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，中国需求激增，Nvidia 向台积电发出新的 H200 芯片订单邀请
item.description: 消息人士称，Nvidia 正努力满足中国科技公司对其 H200 人工智能芯片的强劲需求，并已与合约制造商台湾中芯国际集成电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Nvidia is scrambling to meet strong demand for its H200 artificial intelligence chips from Chinese technology companies and has approached contract manufacturer Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co to ramp up production, sources said.】

item.title: 中国将从 2026 年起对部分进口牛肉征收 55%的额外关税
item.description: 中国商务部周三宣布，如果从包括巴西和美国在内的一些国家进口的牛肉数量超过一定配额，中国将对其征收 55% 的额外关税。【原文：China will impose additional tariffs of 55% on beef imports from some countries including Brazil and the U.S. when shipment amounts exceed certain quotas, the commerce ministry announced on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，特朗普移动推迟了金色智能手机的发货时间
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周三报道，特朗普移动公司（Trump Mobile）推迟了在年底前交付金色智能手机的计划。【原文：Trump Mobile has pushed back plans to deliver its gold-colored smartphone by year-end, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国华大基因斥资 42 亿美元在上海上市，为 DRAM 业务扩张提供资金支持
item.description: 中国领先的 DRAM 芯片制造商长鑫存储科技股份有限公司（CXMT）周二表示，计划通过在上海首次公开发行 106 亿股股票融资 295 亿元人民币（42.2 亿美元）。【原文：China's leading maker of DRAM chips, ChangXin Memory Technologies (CXMT) Corp, said on Tuesday it plans to raise 29.5 billion yuan ($4.22 billion) through an initial public offering of 10.6 billion shares in Shanghai.】

item.title: 白银在 2025 年全球市场的聚光灯下大放异彩，而软质材料和石油则相对落后
item.description: 贵金属是今年大宗商品中表现最突出的品种，白银的表现优于大多数主要股票指数和货币，而黄金则在经济和地缘政治风险的影响下屡创新高。【原文：Precious metals were the standout performers among commodities this year, with silver outperforming most major equity indexes and currencies, while gold hit record highs on economic and geopolitical risks.】
